content: All very true, except this time, the Knicks have a legit unicorn, a player as talented as any Knick since their last championship. As long as the Knicks don’t fuck that up, they’re on the upswing. Rose is a legit asset with his expiring contract as we approach the trade deadline and KP keeps getting better by the minute. As a Boston fan, I’d give up the entire team just to have him. Hell, I’d accept the entire organization too as long as Boston got KP.
